post.text:
"We are going to elect Donald Trump President and turn this country around. We need strong leadership!"
- Bob Dole

comment.author: Samantha
comment.text: TRUMP/PENCE FOR THE FUTURE OF AMERICA !!!! Since justice departments wont find hillary guilty the American people must show their way of finding her guilty and not vote for her!!! VOTE FOR TRUMP !!!! #neverhillary MAKE AMERICA GREAT AND SAFE AGAIN !!!!!!!

replies.author: Jessica
replies.text: Samantha: there are meds to help control your paranoia! See your doc.

replies.author: Tylor
replies.text: A vote for Trump is a vote to rebuke Comey, Lynch, Barry Hussein, and especially a vote to deny Mrs. William Jefferson Clinton a term in the white house.

replies.author: Keisha
replies.text: Tylor It ain't a convention... it's a KKK/American Bund revival. Shameless!!

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: YES! Justice dealt by the American people will happen in November!!
